creator: peter.kazakov@philips.com
text:
I have some working ant examples. When I copy catalina-ant.jar in ant's lib 
directory, all ant builds print:

The input line is too long.
The syntax of the command is incorrect.

When I remove catalina-ant.jar problem disappears. So, it is clearly 
incompatibility problem between ant and tomcat and if the problem is not in 
ant, at least it should print more sensible message.

Can you please provide more information.
OS for example.

I copied catalina-ant.jar to ${ant.home}/lib
without any ill effect.
creator: peter.reilly@corvil.com

text:
Looks like a DOS problem where the command line gets too long. I'm guessing 
that you have a larger than usual Ant classpath and that the catalina jar is 
simply one too much. I don't see anything in your report that suggests that 
there is any incompatibility problem with this jar file in particular. All I 
see is a DOS-level message.
creator: rob@springwellfarms.ca
conor@apache.org
text:
This is fixed in latest CVS. Ant no contructs the classpath in Java rather than
in the launch script.
